Author: xStingx
Text: Thanks. I'm really trying hard to remember that it's not real weight but damn it depressing. üò´ Especially because I think about my weight 24/7. But I will try to stay distracted! God help me. Lol.

Author: Pinus_virginiana
Text: I feel this. TBH I try my best not to weigh myself around that time, cause its always gonna be artificially high :/ Be kind to yourself, ok? When you feel like this, treat yourself to something nice (painting your nails, going out to a movie, whatever works for you). Self-compassion can work wonders ‚ù§Ô∏è
